506.content:
Lucy is trying to work out the answer to 64×25.

Her working out is on the right

On what line does she make her first mistake?

$$64\times25$$

Line 1: $= ( 8\times 8) \times 25$

Line 2: $=(8\times4\times4)\times25$

Line 3: $=(8\times4)\times(4\times25)$

Line $4:=(32)\times(100)=3200$
